summary: Tested two new features in Probate task tracker: 1) Complete All Tasks button - successfully marks all incomplete tasks in a section as complete with one click. 2) Auto-Create Task - when any task status is changed to 'Needed', automatically creates a task record in Airtable with due date 3 days from today and no assignee. Both features working correctly.

context_for_next_testing_agent: Two new features tested and verified: 1) Complete All Tasks button in Pre-Opening and Post-Opening sections of Probate task tracker - marks all incomplete tasks as complete with appropriate status values (Filed, Done, Yes, Dispatched & Complete). 2) Auto-Create Task feature - when any task dropdown is changed to 'Needed', a new task is automatically created in Airtable Tasks table with: task name = '{task label} - {matter name}', due date = 3 days from today, status = 'Not Started', no assignee. Both features integrated with Airtable backend and show toast notifications on success.
